channel.title: CVE Feed for CODESYS -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CODESYS -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-22514|2024-08-03T03:14:55.446Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An authenticated, remote attacker can gain access to a dereferenced pointer contained in a request. The accesses can subsequently lead to local overwriting of memory in the CmpTraceMgr, whereby the attacker can neither gain the values read internally nor control the values to be written. If invalid memory is accessed, this results in a crash.

item.title: CVE-2022-32142|2024-08-03T07:32:55.956Z -- codesys -- runtime%20toolkit
item.description: Multiple CODESYS Products are prone to a out-of bounds read or write access. A low privileged remote attacker may craft a request with invalid offset, which can cause an out-of-bounds read or write access, resulting in denial-of-service condition or local memory overwrite, which can lead to a change of local files. User interaction is not required.

item.title: CVE-2022-31803|2024-08-03T07:26:01.247Z -- codesys -- codesys%20gateway%20server%20v2
item.description: In CODESYS Gateway Server V2 an insufficient check for the activity of TCP client connections allows an unauthenticated attacker to consume all available TCP connections and prevent legitimate users or clients from establishing a new connection to the CODESYS Gateway Server V2. Existing connections are not affected and therefore remain intact.

item.title: CVE-2022-32143|2024-08-03T07:32:55.974Z -- codesys -- runtime%20toolkit
item.description: In multiple CODESYS products, file download and upload function allows access to internal files in the working directory e.g. firmware files of the PLC. All requests are processed on the controller only if no level 1 password is configured on the controller or if remote attacker has previously successfully authenticated himself to the controller. A successful Attack may lead to a denial of service, change of local files, or drain of confidential Information. User interaction is not required

item.title: CVE-2022-22516|2024-08-03T03:14:55.441Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: The SysDrv3S driver in the CODESYS Control runtime system on Microsoft Windows allows any system user to read and write within restricted memory space.

item.title: CVE-2022-32141|2024-08-03T07:32:56.012Z -- codesys -- runtime%20toolkit
item.description: Multiple CODESYS Products are prone to a buffer over read. A low privileged remote attacker may craft a request with an invalid offset, which can cause an internal buffer over-read, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. User interaction is not required.

item.title: CVE-2022-22513|2024-08-03T03:14:55.460Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An authenticated remote attacker can cause a null pointer dereference in the CmpSettings component of the affected CODESYS products which leads to a crash.

item.title: CVE-2022-31806|2024-08-03T07:26:01.118Z -- codesys -- codesys%20plcwinnt
item.description: In CODESYS V2 PLCWinNT and Runtime Toolkit 32 in versions prior to V2.4.7.57 password protection is not enabled by default and there is no information or prompt to enable password protection at login in case no password is set at the controller.

item.title: CVE-2022-22518|2024-08-03T03:14:55.478Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20for%20beaglebone%20sl
item.description: A bug in CmpUserMgr component can lead to only partially applied security policies. This can result in enabled, anonymous access to components part of the applied security policy.

item.title: CVE-2022-31805|2024-08-03T07:26:01.086Z -- codesys -- codesys%20development%20system
item.description: In the CODESYS Development System multiple components in multiple versions transmit the passwords for the communication between clients and servers unprotected.

item.title: CVE-2022-30792|2024-08-03T07:03:38.599Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: In CmpChannelServer of CODESYS V3 in multiple versions an uncontrolled ressource consumption allows an unauthorized attacker to block new communication channel connections. Existing connections are not affected.

item.title: CVE-2022-4046|2024-08-03T01:27:54.486Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20for%20beaglebone%20sl
item.description: In CODESYS Control in multiple versions a improper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffer allow an remote attacker with user privileges to gain full access of the device.

item.title: CVE-2022-32140|2024-08-03T07:32:55.985Z -- codesys -- runtime%20toolkit
item.description: Multiple CODESYS products are affected to a buffer overflow.A low privileged remote attacker may craft a request, which can cause a buffer copy without checking the size of the service, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. User Interaction is not required.

item.title: CVE-2022-1989|2024-08-03T00:24:44.157Z -- codesys -- codesys%20visualization
item.description: All CODESYS Visualization versions before V4.2.0.0 generate a login dialog vulnerable to information exposure allowing a remote, unauthenticated attacker to enumerate valid users.

item.title: CVE-2022-22517|2024-08-03T03:14:55.454Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: An unauthenticated, remote attacker can disrupt existing communication channels between CODESYS products by guessing a valid channel ID and injecting packets. This results in the communication channel to be closed.

item.title: CVE-2022-31804|2024-08-03T07:26:01.284Z -- codesys -- codesys%20gateway%20server%20v2
item.description: The CODESYS Gateway Server V2 does not verifiy that the size of a request is within expected limits. An unauthenticated attacker may allocate an arbitrary amount of memory, which may lead to a crash of the Gateway due to an out-of-memory condition.

item.title: CVE-2022-32139|2024-08-03T07:32:56.024Z -- codesys -- runtime%20toolkit
item.description: In multiple CODESYS products, a low privileged remote attacker may craft a request, which cause an out-of-bounds read, resulting in a denial-of-service condition. User Interaction is not required.

item.title: CVE-2022-32138|2024-08-03T07:32:56.049Z -- codesys -- runtime%20toolkit
item.description: In multiple CODESYS products, a remote attacker may craft a request which may cause an unexpected sign extension, resulting in a denial-of-service condition or memory overwrite.

item.title: CVE-2022-31802|2024-08-03T07:26:01.284Z -- codesys -- codesys%20gateway%20server%20v2
item.description: In CODESYS Gateway Server V2 for versions prior to V2.3.9.38 only a part of the the specified password is been compared to the real CODESYS Gateway password. An attacker may perform authentication by specifying a small password that matches the corresponding part of the longer real CODESYS Gateway password.

item.title: CVE-2022-32137|2024-08-03T07:32:56.007Z -- codesys -- runtime%20toolkit
item.description: In multiple CODESYS products, a low privileged remote attacker may craft a request, which may cause a heap-based buffer overflow, resulting in a denial-of-service condition or memory overwrite. User interaction is not required.

item.title: CVE-2022-22519|2024-08-03T03:14:55.378Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: A remote, unauthenticated attacker can send a specific crafted HTTP or HTTPS requests causing a buffer over-read resulting in a crash of the webserver of the CODESYS Control runtime system.

item.title: CVE-2022-4224|2024-08-03T01:34:49.591Z -- codesys -- control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: In multiple products of CODESYS v3 in multiple versions a remote low privileged user could utilize this vulnerability to read and modify system files and OS resources or DoS the device.

item.title: CVE-2022-1965|2024-08-03T00:24:43.779Z -- codesys -- runtime%20toolkit
item.description: Multiple products of CODESYS implement a improper error handling. A low privilege remote attacker may craft a request, which is not properly processed by the error handling. In consequence, the file referenced by the request could be deleted. User interaction is not required.

item.title: CVE-2022-22515|2024-08-03T03:14:55.437Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: A remote, authenticated attacker could utilize the control program of the CODESYS Control runtime system to use the vulnerability in order to read and modify the configuration file(s) of the affected products.

item.title: CVE-2022-4048|2024-08-03T01:27:54.123Z -- codesys -- codesys%20development%20system%20v3
item.description: Inadequate Encryption Strength in CODESYS Development System V3 versions prior to V3.5.18.40 allows an unauthenticated local attacker to access and manipulate code of the encrypted boot application.

item.title: CVE-2022-1794|2024-08-03T00:16:59.853Z -- codesys -- codesys%20opc%20da%20server
item.description: The CODESYS OPC DA Server prior V3.5.18.20 stores PLC passwords as plain text in its configuration file so that it is visible to all authorized Microsoft Windows users of the system.

item.title: CVE-2022-32136|2024-08-03T07:32:56.014Z -- codesys -- runtime%20toolkit
item.description: In multiple CODESYS products, a low privileged remote attacker may craft a request that cause a read access to an uninitialized pointer, resulting in a denial-of-service. User interaction is not required.

item.title: CVE-2022-30791|2024-08-03T07:03:38.611Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20rte%20%28sl%29
item.description: In CmpBlkDrvTcp of CODESYS V3 in multiple versions an uncontrolled ressource consumption allows an unauthorized attacker to block new TCP connections. Existing connections are not affected.

item.title: CVE-2023-5751|2024-08-02T08:07:32.848Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20win%20%28sl%29
item.description: A local attacker with low privileges can read and modify any users files and cause a DoS in the working directory of the affected products due to exposure of resource to wrong sphere.

item.title: CVE-2023-49676|2024-06-12T20:23:58.235Z -- codesys -- codesys%20development%20system%20v2.3
item.description: An unauthenticated local attacker may trick a user to open corrupted project files to crash the system due to use after free vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-5000|2024-06-06T14:44:44.216Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20for%20beaglebone%20sl
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can use a malicious OPC UA client to send a crafted request to affected CODESYS products which can cause a DoS due to incorrect calculation of buffer size.

item.title: CVE-2023-49676|2024-05-06T11:09:34.442Z -- codesys -- codesys%20development%20system%20v2.3
item.description: An unauthenticated local attacker may trick a user to open corrupted project files to crash the system due to use after free vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-49675|2024-06-04T17:27:55.639Z -- codesys -- codesys%20development%20system%20v2.3
item.description: An unauthenticated local attacker may trick a user to open corrupted project files to execute arbitrary code or crash the system due to an out-of-bounds write vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-5751|2024-06-04T17:28:31.539Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20win%20%28sl%29
item.description: A local attacker with low privileges can read and modify any users files and cause a DoS in the working directory of the affected products due to exposure of resource to wrong sphere.

item.title: CVE-2024-5000|2024-08-01T20:55:10.389Z -- codesys -- codesys%20control%20for%20beaglebone%20sl
item.description: An unauthenticated remote attacker can use a malicious OPC UA client to send a crafted request to affected CODESYS products which can cause a DoS due to incorrect calculation of buffer size.

item.title: CVE-2023-49675|2024-08-02T22:01:25.850Z -- codesys -- codesys%20development%20system%20v2.3
item.description: An unauthenticated local attacker may trick a user to open corrupted project files to execute arbitrary code or crash the system due to an out-of-bounds write vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-49676|2024-08-02T22:01:25.611Z -- codesys -- codesys%20development%20system%20v2.3
item.description: An unauthenticated local attacker may trick a user to open corrupted project files to crash the system due to use after free vulnerability.
